column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for your review
column2: Vivian! We are sorry to hear you had a disappointing experience the last time you dined with us. Have you been back to Chicago since this review? If so
column3: we would love to hear from you. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information. Again
column4: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
